creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
description: paper collage; abstract image with painterly brushstrokes of color--predominately reds and blues; brown along right edge; ovoid red element at bottom center; received framed, not glazed
marks:
Signature and Inscription

LLC, in blue: [bones] LRC, in pencil: [Walker]
medium: Oil, ink, mixed media, and collage on paper
provenance: [Knoedler Gallery, New York; sold to Mersky]; Mary and Robert Mersky, Minneapolis (until 2014; given to MIA)
title: Untitled (Bones and Clams)
